response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, reflecting years of innovation and dedication. Considering its unique features and unparalleled benefits, we're offering it to you at an exclusive price of $12,000. We believe this is a fair and generous offer that allows you to experience the best while also making a significant investment in your needs or goals. Please let us know if you have any questions or require further details about the product. We look forward to the opportunity to serve you.", "product_price": 12000}
